content:
I've got 2 open developer positions at McKesson (in Durham, NC) that would benefit from FHIR experience.
https://mckesson.taleo.net/careersection/ex/jobdetail.ftl?job=18008687&tz=GMT-04%3A00
https://mckesson.taleo.net/careersection/ex/jobdetail.ftl?job=18008677&tz=GMT-04%3A00
They both will end up reporting to me, let me know if you have any questions.
